name: Code Project Manager
short_description:
I would like to make a website like srouceforge but with business principle.
The more code you put in the project the more your precentage grows.
The website will be managed by a visual Interface. that will represent a tree of developers.
Each developer may be responsible of others are give them guide lines.

After we have a product we may sell it. and the system will be responsible of managing the money to each developer by his presentage of coding.

Thats the main idea.

please tell me what you think.
and im wheeling to buy a website space for testing of anyone think its a good idea.
